short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that replaces your new tab with motivational quotes, daily goals, quick links, & a to-do list to help you stay focused

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Newtabify is a productivity-focused Chrome extension that replaces your default new tab page with a customizable dashboard designed to help you stay motivated and achieve your daily goals.

Featuring a rotating selection of inspirational quotes, beautiful background images,  convenient quick links to your favorite websites and a to-do list to stay organized. 

Newtabify provides a simple yet powerful way to start your day on the right foot and stay productive throughout. Whether you're looking to stay focused on your work, build healthy habits, or just stay inspired, Newtabify is the perfect companion to help you get there.

For any queries, please contact at newtabify@gmail.com

Follow us on Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/newtabify/
